Attribute.Name: Requires Vendor Action
Attribute.ValueTemplate:
<derive expr="if(
    Or(
        ListContains(
            WorkflowIDs(),
            "VENDORCOPYITEM"
        )=1,
        ListContains(
            WorkflowIDs(),
            "seeded_items"
        )=1,
        ListContains(
            WorkflowIDs(),
            "specialty_seeded_items"
        )=1,
        ListContains(
            WorkflowIDs(),
            "PLMINITIATE"
        )=1,
        ListContains(
            WorkflowIDs(),
            "ENRICH"
        )=1,
        ListContains(
            WorkflowIDs(),
            "SUPPLYCHAINENRICH"
        )=1,
        ListContains(
            WorkflowIDs(),
            "SSKUENRICH"
        )=1,
        ListContains(
            WorkflowIDs(),
            "SPECIALTYENRICH"
        )=1,
        ListContains(
            WorkflowIDs(),
            "PREPACKENRICH"
        )=1,
        ListContains(
            WorkflowIDs(),
            "SUPPLYCHAINENRICHMB"
        )=1,
        ListContains(
            WorkflowIDs(),
            "HAZFULLYREG"
        )=1,
        ListContains(
            WorkflowIDs(),
            "DQHAZMAT"
        )=1,
        ListContains(
            WorkflowIDs(),
            "DQSPECANDIMAGES"
        )=1,
        ListContains(
            WorkflowIDs(),
            "DQSUPPLYCHAIN"
        )=1,
        ListContains(
            WorkflowIDs(),
            "MAINTENANCE"
        )=1,
        ListContains(
            WorkflowIDs(),
            "DAXVENDORREVIEW"
        )=1,
        ListContains(
            WorkflowIDs(),
            "SPECIALTYMAINTENANCE"
        )=1,
        ListContains(
            WorkflowIDs(),
            "VENDORDISCONTINUED"
        )=1,
        ListContains(
            WorkflowIDs(),
            "WERCS"
        )=1,
	 ListContains(
            CurrentWorkflowStates('DOTCOM'),
            "INVENTORYHOLD"
        )=1


    )=1,
    "Yes",
    "No"
)"/>

MetaData.Value: If Yes, then the product requires work/input from the Vendor.
Calculated attribute which derives simple Y/N feedback to the vendor indicating their level of agency in the process.
Pending 9/6 Release. Created for Alexandra Eldredge
